context: The British had established a new ruler in Chitral. Shuja-ul-Mulk ruled until 1936 and had four wives and four concubines, all of whom produced children.

The investigators , all part of a team known as the Antithrombotic Trialists ' Collaboration ( ATC ) , looked at whether the antiplatelets cut patients ' risk of heart attack , stroke and death from a cardiovascular cause . They found that overall, any antiplatelet therapy led to a one-third drop in heart attack risk, while the risk of non-fatal stroke fell by a quarter and cardiovascular death risk declined by one sixth.

Putting a baby into a double , queen , or king-sized bed , 2-3 feet off the floor , with a soft mattress , mattress pads , thick covers , blankets , pillows , comforters , etc... may be quite different from co-sleeping as practiced in Asian countries for example .
